line.comment: * We're starting an imported Pirate Guild
* Apply initial F/F settings for pirate ships
* remove element from array $ImportData at index 0
* if more docks exist than PB records, drop random excess docks
* Upgrade docks to Pirate Bases using data from export
* Does base have a jump beacon?

sval.val: We're starting an imported Pirate Guild
Apply initial F/F settings for pirate ships
remove element from array $ImportData at index 0
if more docks exist than PB records, drop random excess docks
Upgrade docks to Pirate Bases using data from export
Does base have a jump beacon?
